    • intIsWithinRange

      public boolean intIsWithinRange​(int num, int min, int max)
      Checks if a number is within range
      Parameters:
      num - Number to be checked
      min - Minimum value accepted for number
      max - Maximum value accepted for number
      Returns:
      true if within min and max values, and false if not within min and max values

    • strIsWithinRange

      public boolean strIsWithinRange​(java.lang.String scannerInput, int min, int max)
      Checks if string is within a certain number of characters
      Parameters:
      scannerInput - User input
      min - Minimum characters required for the input
      max - Maximum characters accepted for input
      Returns:
      true if number of characters is between min and max and false if number of characters is not between min and max
